7 June 2009

Kim Riddlebarger mp3s

by Aaron Lord

Here are some mp3s so you can hear Kim Riddlebarger make his Case for Amillennialism on your iPhone/iPod:
<ul><li>Kim Riddlebarger on SermonAudio.com</li><li>Kim Riddlebarger on IIIM</li></ul>One of the highlights for me was during the Q & A where he said the Reformed church he planted has special pastoral needs because most of the congregation came from Calvary Chapel.
